entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-09
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [dotnet run] No way to ignore arguments specified in launch profile #45832
    9.0.2xx
  • Unable to build .NET 9 Android Maui app when targeting non default architectures #48890
  • [10.0 Preview 4 VMR build] In Debian OS, after installing tar.gz package, the command line dotnet--info does not display sdk/runtime/templates #48514

Updated

  • CanIgnoreTemplateGroupsWithConstraints flaky test failing in CI #46212
  • dotnet watch - Failure in DeleteSubfolder test with polling #46454
  • aspnetcore build failure - Child node 7 exited prematurely #46398
  • [dotnet watch] Cannot open project Lib.fsproj because extension fsproj is not associated with a language #46378
  • Build failure in VMR Vertical Build Windows_x64: Downloading vswhere - Process cannot access sdk.txt because it is being used by another process #45809
  • Workload Feature Band Test Sometimes Fails #45314
    10.0.1xx
  • Template engine tests hitting known parallelism issue in GetVisualStudioInstances #44878
    10.0.1xx
  • ToolInstallCommandTests.WhenRunWithRoot is flaky #42346
    10.0.1xx
  • Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers.IntegrationTests are pulling from Docker Hub #42026
    10.0.1xx
  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
    10.0.1xx
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
    10.0.1xx
  • Failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
    10.0.1xx
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
    10.0.1xx
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
    10.0.1xx
  • `dotnet sln add` should allow non-project files to be added to the solution #9611
    Backlog
  • Improve manpage infrastucture #8545
    Backlog
  • `dotnet publish` is not idempotent for single file publishing when project contains App.config #38128
  • .net framework need to give customer more granular control on retry config to achieve higher resiliency and compatibility #48869
  • [NETSDKE2E][VMR][Regression][VScode][macOS and Win arm64] ASP.Net symbols are missing for IL symbols. #48762
  • Better way of hooking into "Before" Publish #3196
    Discussion
  • Reference transitive not working well when app and libs has different targetFramework, and lib use an transitive reference from special targetFramework of an multi-targetFramework PackageReference/ProjectReference #3103
    Backlog
  • runtime.json only works if PackageReference is directly referenced by project #2794
    Discussion
  • FileUtilities.GetFileVersion allocates 16mb of strings (170k objects) #2522
    Backlog
  • Winforms/WPF .NET9.0 app cannot be ran on Windows 10 20H2(OS build 19042.2965) #43115

PullRequests

Created

  • macOS: Include global tools in zsh $PATH #48893
  • real structures around package input formats for dotnet new commands #48892
  • Set interceptors property for validations source generator #48891
  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #48886
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #48882

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #48881
  • Use host RID for crossgen2 during source-build #48880
  • sln-add: --include-references when adding a project #48815
    Area-CLI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #48775

Updated

  • Add GitHub Action workflow to update man pages #48784
  • Slnx should now be found when using the DotnetSlnPostAction #48879
  • Skip splitting for paths Fixes #48794 #48874
  • Ensure file-based program artifacts are restricted to the current user #48813
    Area-run-file
  • Add file-based program API for use by IDE #48749
    Area-run-file
  • Include only PackageReferences included at runtime in deps.json #46218
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, Branch Lockdown
  • Remove nullable disable warnings #48846
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Fix path to tool settings file in build #48877
    Servicing-consider
  • Support RID-specific .NET Tool packages #48575
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'release/9.0.3xx' #48856
